title: A Valentine for Mr. Thorne
description: What do you get the man who has everything?When Maddy Thorne agreed to marry her billionaire boss so he could stay in the country, she never expected to fall for him. And she certainly didn't expect that he'd fall for her. But now, it's their first February as a couple and Maddy is left with the burning question: what the hell do you get a billionaire for Valentine's day?After a quest that sends her all around the city, reminiscing about her strange love story as she goes, Maddy wonders if she'll ever find the perfect gift. But inspiration often strikes where it's least expected...This limited edition short novella takes place after I Married a Billionaire, but can be read as a standalone.
author: Melanie Marchande
